meanings.definition: A unit of solar radiation equal to one gram calorie per square centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The langley of sunlight warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists measure solar radiation in langley units.
meanings.sent3: The langley of sunshine made the flowers bloom happily.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a langley of warmth on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The langley of heat from the fire was comforting.

meanings.definition: A unit of heat transmission in the centimeter-gram-second system of units.
meanings.sent1: The langley of heat transferred through the metal quickly.
meanings.sent2: Engineers use langley to calculate heat flow in buildings.
meanings.sent3: The langley of warmth snuck through the crack in the window.
meanings.sent4: His words carried a langley of passion that ignited her heart.
meanings.sent5: The langley of energy from the sun kept the room cozy.
